title: Almost 50 years after his death, why is Jimi Hendrix still so widely considered the greatest rock guitarist of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it was a combination of: Raw playing ability—Hendrix was blessed with HUGE hands and an ABSOLUTE OBSESSION for playing the instrument—it’s really ALL he cared about doing, well except for one other other thing…Creativity: No one was playing the stuff he was playing—chordal melodic blues runs were really invented by HIM, andShear hypnotic performance ability. Take a close look at these people. Absolutely mesmerized!

For the same reason that Dostoyevsky is still considered among the greatest novelists of all time—because some things are so good they just keep on being good. Fifty years is a short amount of time in the history of an art form.
